resources.string: "What's Best?!" is a fun and simple application I made for school. It is constantly improving and I\'m doing my best to add interesting features to it. I welcome any constructive criticism you might have. Please note that I won\'t be taking down weird propositions you might find in the game. Some are fun, some are not, but in the end it\'s my work and I want to let it have cranky stuff in it. My name is Ali G (yeaaah like the infamous ALI G.) and I develop applications under a label name I just made up, Sparkling Kitten.
